oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Fort Pillow Massacre
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print of the Fort Pillow Massacre showing General Forrest's Confederate troops firing and bayonetting the surrendering Federal force under Major William F. Bradford.
Kurz and Allison was a well-known Chicago firm specializing in colorful and dramatic chromolithograph prints of American historical events.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kurz & Allison
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United Stated - Hitory - Civil War, 1861-1865; Forrest, Nathan Bedford, 1821-1877; Fort Pillow, Battle of, Tenn., 1864; Lauderdale County (Tenn.)
Soldiers
